title: Popularity of Fidel Castro in Cuba 2015
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Very/somewhat negative and lowest at Response Don't know / no answer.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 44.0.
min_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 50.0 is found at Response Very/somewhat negative and the minimum is found at Don't know / no answer where Share of respondents is 6.0.
